repnme.cdata!:
Pakistan - Second Lahore Water Supply
            Sewerage and Drainage Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Lahore Water Supply Sewerage
            and Drainage Project in Pakistan was accomplished. The
            International Development Association (IDA) accepted the
            risk of dealing with a new institution and maintained its
            role in the long process of institution building, making
            adequate provisions in the project for engineering support
            to WASA with design and construction advice, and for a
            management team to assist in operations and training. The
            Bank was aware of the Water and Sanitation Agency (WASA)
            inherent problems at the time of appraisal, but possibly
            underestimated the effect. Too much faith was given to the
            inputs of engineering consultants to overcome many of these
            problems. This project confirms the importance of adequate
            project preparation. For more effective project execution,
            it might have been appropriate to extend or intensify the
            assistance of external consultants, but then the effect of
            learning by doing may have been less than desired for WASA.

Pakistan - Second Lahore Water Supply
            Sewerage and Drainage Project

repnme.cdata!:
Pakistan - Second Lahore Water Supply
            Sewerage and Drainage Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of the following
            components: (1) water supply: (i) the construction of
            tubewells and transmission mains and the construction or
            rehabilitation of main grid and distribution network; (ii)
            the improvement of operations by the creation of a hydrology
            unit and a leak detection and repair unit, the
            implementation of a planned preventive maintenance program,
            the metering of tubewells and the creation of a control
            center for tubewell pumping and the carrying out of a
            training program; (2) sewerage and drainage: (i) the
            construction of trunk sewers, collector sewers, 4 new
            pumping stations and the extension of 1 existing pumping
            station and a prototype waste stabilization pond; (ii) the
            construction or rehabilitation of secondary drainage
            channels; (iii) the carrying out of an environmental study
            of the River Ravi and the use of sewage for the irrigation
            of crops; (3) offices, Buildings, Vehicles and Equipment;
            (4) training facilities and programs; (5) Lahore urban
            development and traffic studies.

docna.cdata!:
Pakistan - Second Lahore Water Supply
            Sewerage and Drainage Project
